cellularData

Class GraphView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • cellularData.GraphView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GraphView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Construct a GraphView class to create a GraphView panel Measure the relative coordinate and print the dots on the panel according to the coordinates Print the X and Y axis and add label to it
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public GraphView(int w,
                 int h,
                 LinkedList<Country> countries)

        Parameters:
        w - the width of the panel
        h - the height of the panel
        countries - the country list which is going to be printed
